Grand Master Tronix:
Congratulations! You have now become a proud Dark Elven Palace Knight. Life as a Palace Knight may still be unfamiliar, but by learning skills one by one from nearby masters, I know that you will become worthy of our trust.
In the name of Shilen, I pray that you may grow in strength and power to crush those arrogant Elves.
This is a small gift we have prepared to help you on your journey. Take it to the Grand Master, Grand Magister, Master Trainer or High Priest who permits transfers in any major town and you will be able to exchange it for a Shadow Weapon.
